header.title: Member Organizations
header.description: Meet the dedicated organizations working together to build a stronger, safer Murray community.

members.name: Salt Lake County Health Department
members.description: Offering a long list of programs including tobacco prevention, STD clinic, food protection, and community health initiatives.

members.name: Intermountain Medical Center
members.description: Providing advanced medical care in a friendly and supportive environment for the Murray community.

members.name: Murray School District
members.description: Dedicated to cultivating a safe, supportive, and inspiring environment where every student is empowered to succeed.

members.name: Murray City
members.description: Dedicated to preserving our rich history while building a vibrant, connected, and forward-thinking community.

members.name: Select Health
members.description: Offer plans to serve all members of our community from individuals and families to employers.

members.name: Murray Chamber of Commerce
members.description: Empowering local businesses, fostering community connections, and driving economic growth in Murray.

members.name: Exchange Club
members.description: Proudly dedicated to serving our community through Unity for Service and prevention of child abuse.

members.name: Murray Rotary
members.description: Dedicated to serving our community through impactful projects, fellowship, and leadership development.

members.name: Murray Youth Community Council
members.description: A union of student leaders and business partners who come together through networking, internships, and community service.

cta.title: Want to Join the Coalition?
cta.description: Organizations of all types are welcome to join Murray Partners 4 Prevention. Together, we can build a stronger, safer community.
